product_name: Aloe Gator Tropical Lip Balm with Biner - SPF 30
long_description: Aloe Gator Tropical SPF 30 lip balm protects your lips from dryness and sun damage. Provides SPF 30 sun protection and contains aloe and vitamin E to soothe chapped or sunburned lips. PABA-free formula glides on easily and lasts, even during high-activity sports. Apply liberally before sun exposure and reapply as needed. Aloe Gator Tropical lip balm comes with a small carabiner so you can clip it to the outside of your backpack.
short_description: Aloe Gator Tropical SPF 30 lip balm protects your lips from dryness and sun damage.
